remarks: Distribution of compositions in preparation for endomorphism sum definition.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2013.)
statement:
tendof.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendof.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendof.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendoco2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( U e. E /\ V e. E ) /\ ( F e. T /\ G e. T ) ) -> ( ( U ` ( F o. G ) ) o. ( V ` ( F o. G ) ) ) = ( ( ( U ` F ) o. ( V ` F ) ) o. ( ( U ` G ) o. ( V ` G ) ) ) ) $.
